statements: UPDATE comedy_podcast_data SET downloads = 1000 WHERE episode_id = 1
UPDATE comedy_podcast_data SET listener_demographic = 'Millennials' WHERE episode_title = 'Funny Episode'
UPDATE comedy_podcast_data SET downloads = 5000, listener_demographic = 'Young Adults' WHERE episode_id = 1001
UPDATE comedy_podcast_data SET listener_demographic = 'Families', downloads = 7000, release_date = '2021-09-30' WHERE episode_id = 2005
UPDATE episode_downloads SET download_count = download_count + 1 WHERE episode_id = 123 AND listener_id = 456;
UPDATE listener_demographics SET age = 30, gender = 'Female' WHERE listener_id = 789;
UPDATE episode_downloads SET download_count = download_count + 1 WHERE episode_id = 101 AND listener_id = 201
UPDATE listener_demographics SET age = age + 1, gender = 'Other' WHERE listener_id = 301
UPDATE episode_downloads SET download_count = download_count + 1 WHERE listener_id = 123 AND episode_id = 456;
UPDATE podcast_episodes SET release_date = '2022-10-15', episode_duration = 45 WHERE episode_id = 789;
UPDATE episode_downloads SET download_count = 100 WHERE episode_id = 1;
UPDATE listener_demographics SET age = 30, gender = 'Male' WHERE listener_id = 5;
UPDATE comedy_podcast_network SET downloads = 1000 WHERE episode_id = 1;
UPDATE episode_stats SET total_downloads = 500, average_listen_duration = '01:30:00' WHERE episode_id = 2;
UPDATE comedy_podcast_network SET downloads = downloads + 1000, listener_demographics = '{"age": 25, "location": "New York", "interests": ["comedy", "music"]}' WHERE episode_id = 123
UPDATE episode_stats SET total_downloads = total_downloads + 500, total_listeners = total_listeners + 200 WHERE episode_id = 456
UPDATE episodes SET release_date = '2022-05-15' WHERE episode_id = 1;
UPDATE listeners SET age = 30, location = 'New York' WHERE listener_id = 2;
UPDATE episodes SET release_date = '2021-09-15', download_count = 100 WHERE episode_id = 1;
UPDATE listeners_episodes SET download_date = '2021-09-20', listening_duration_minutes = 45 WHERE episode_id = 2 AND listener_id = 3;
